mainText:
We are all fans of his products, we all fans of Steve and his products had a big lost when we knew about his death, i have a big part of my heart suffering along with his family, friends and co-workers. Well when I knew about his death in a colombian tv channel at the news programme I shivered when I saw about his death.

Thank You Steve for the changes you made in the world with your products, and my heart is with Apple and his family.
author: Juan Ignacio
